title: Ep. 84 - Office Softball Team
description:
The boys really went hard on this one. They recapped some hilarious behind the scene moments from the comedy tour and then dove right into world issues like dehydration, couch sleep, public restrooms, bad shoe stores, cheating on tests in college and high school, counterfeit money, the life of a PGA professional, and get into a lengthy discuss about adults who take softball leagues too seriously, as well as construct their lineup for a potential PMI company softball team. Come have a good time with us!


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @GumpSox10, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.


Episode Sponsor and Discounts:

SeatGeek - The best ticket buying platform on the planet and the moon. Download the app and use the promo code HEARTLAND for $10 off your first SeatGeek purchase.

LeesaMattress - The best mattress in the industry, shipped directly to your door. Get 10% off any mattress + 2 free pillows if you go to leesa.com/HEARTLAND and enter the promo code HEARTLAND at checkout. Save yourself up to $220!

The Dave App - The #1 budgeting app in America. It saves you from overdraft fees, tells you about upcoming bills, and can advance you up to $75 from your next paycheck with no credit check and no interest. Go to Dave.com/HEARTLAND so they know we sent you.
